Registration.title: Registration
Registration.description: Represents a user's registration for a sport.

id.description: Unique identifier for the registration entry.

name.description: The name of the person registering.

department.description: The department the registrant belongs to.

jobTitle.description: The job title of the registrant.

governorate.description: The governorate the registrant lives in.

maestroCode.description: The Maestro code of the registrant. Must be unique.

nationalId.description: The national ID of the registrant.

gender.description: The gender of the registrant (male or female).

sport.description: The sport the registrant is signing up for.

sportOption.description: The specific option chosen for the sport (e.g., football team name).

tShirtSize.description: The T-shirt size for football players (L, XL, 2XL, 3XL).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the registration was created automatically.

definition.description: Stores user registration data for sports.

params.name: registrationId
params.description: Unique identifier for the registration document.

definition.description: Stores logs of admin dashboard access.

params.name: logId
params.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

firestore.reasoning: Data structure stores comprehensive registration info and admin access logs for security auditing.
